title: The Sixers Are ... Fine? Plus, More Knicks Drama, and Oh My God, Zion | Group Chat
description:
Despite concerns surrounding Joel Embiid’s incendiary comments earlier this week, the Philadelphia 76ers defeated the Los Angeles Clippers; could this be the year the Embiid–Ben Simmons experiment succeeds (1:24)? Plus: The New York Knicks keep making headlines for all the wrong reasons, as their new brand consultant, Steve Stoute, publicly comments on the future of interim head coach Mike Miller (32:00), and rookie star Zion Williamson continues to amaze (41:35).
Hosts: Justin Verrier and Chris Ryan

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
